Translations.Text: elmalu velbenune zinetu-lhayati-ddunya. velbakiyatu-ssalihatu hayrun `inde rabbike sevabev vehayrun emela
veyevme nuseyyiru-lcibale vetera-l'arda barizetev vehasernahum felem nugadir minhum ehada
ve`uridu `ala rabbike saffa. lekad ci'tumuna kema halaknakum evvele merrah. bel za`amtum ellen nec`ale lekum mev`ida

vevudi`a-lkitabu fetere-lmucrimine musfikine mimma fihi veyekulune ya veyletena ma lihaze-lkitabi la yugadiru sagiratev vela kebiraten illa ahsaha. vevecedu ma `amilu hadira. vela yazlimu rabbuke ehada
veiz kulna lilmelaiketi-scudu liademe fesecedu illa iblis. kane mine-lcinni fefeseka `an emri rabbih. efetettehizunehu vezurriyyetehu evliyae min duni vehum lekum `aduvv. bi'se lizzalimine bedela
ma eshettuhum halka-ssemavati vel'ardi vela halka enfusihim. vema kuntu muttehize-lmudilline `aduda
veyevme yekulu nadu surakaiye-llezine za`amtum fede`avhum felem yestecibu lehum vece`alna beynehum mevbika
verae-lmucrimune-nnara fezannu ennehum muvaki`uha velem yecidu `anha masrifa
